## Combine daily temp, press and SST data together

```{r}
shark_daily_td <- 
  SST %>% 
  full_join(shark_daily_depths) %>% 
  full_join(shark_daily_temps)
```



## T vs D regression
```{r}
shark_td_lm_plot <- 
shark_daily_td %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = SST, y = daily_max_depth)) +
  #geom_smooth(aes(x = daily_max_temp, y = daily_max_depth), method = "gam", formula = y ~ s(x, bs = 'cs')) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x = SST, y = daily_max_depth), method = "lm") +
  theme_minimal() +
  ylab("Daily maximum depth (mbsl)") + 
  xlab("SST")
shark_td_lm_plot
```

It looks like the 5Â°C difference (summer vs winter) leads to a 50m difference in maximum daily depths, from 60 - 120m
